title: New tools for linking transport and land use planning

author: Pekka Räty, Finnra - Finnish Road Administration

segmentation: Good afternoon ladies and gentlemen.
When the land use of certain areas plant.
Trip generation and travel patterns must be known in order to to plan the necessary traffic conditions and services.
But the available data, however.
Often fragmented.
And do not try directly concerned the area under examination.
And therefore we created a new land use classification.
That combines existing traffic behavior.
Data and geographic information data.
On this social structure and the traffic system.
Into one set of data material.

The created classification.
I give one or two examples.

And after that.
The values of selected variables where calculated.
For each square.
The data describing the traffic system.

Database.
In Finland.

Was discovered right by using residential density and the density of workplaces.

According to proximity factor.
